name: Timeline of Historical Events Quiz | Famous Dates | 10 Questions

questions.text: When did Joan of Arc live?
questions.explanation:
15th century.

	Joan's short life was in the early 1400s in France.

questions.text: When did the Black Death occur?
questions.explanation:
14th century.

	The Plague devastated Europe in the 1340s and early 1350s and returned several times.

questions.text: When did Attila the Hun "scourge" Western Europe?
questions.explanation:
5th century.

	Attila terrorized all foes during the 5th century.

13th century.

	Marco Polo did his trading during the late 1200s.

questions.text: When was the Gunpowder Plot (Guy Fawkes Plot) in England?
questions.explanation:
17th century.

	This plot against the English throne was in 1605.

questions.text: When was the mutiny on the Bounty?
questions.explanation:
18th century.

	The famous mutiny occurred in the late 1700s.

questions.text: In which century did Thomas Becket live and die?
questions.explanation:
12th centruy.

	Becket's conflict with Henry II was in the 1100s.

questions.text: When did the Spanish Armada try to defeat England?
questions.explanation:
16th century.

	Francis Drake and the English (and the weather) destroyed the Armada at the end of the 16th century.

questions.text: When did King John of England agree to Magna Carta?
questions.explanation:
13th century.

	The first version dates from 1215. It was revised a number of times in the 13th century. The 1297 revision was the first to have the approval of parliament.

16th century.

	The first half of the 16th century. (Pizarro in Peru, too)
